Institution.Name: IMD Weather forecast and Agro-meteorological advisory

Forecast_Up_To.Description: Likely to receive very light rainfall, clear to cloudy sky conditions, wind speed 06-10 km/h, max temp 28-30°C, min temp 16-19°C.

Advisory.Seedling treatment: 0.2% Chloropyriphos for 10-12 hours to control stemborer

Advisory.Transplanting: 3-5 week old seedlings in well puddled soil at 15cm x 15cm spacing with 3-4 seedlings per hill

Advisory.In bacterial blight endemic areas: Dip seedling roots in 0.1% Plantomycin solution before transplanting

Advisory.Basal dose application: (DAP 44 kg + MOP 22 kg) or (Urea 22 kg + SSP 125 kg + MOP 22 kg) during final puddling

Advisory.Pheromone traps application: Put 3 traps with 5mg lure/acre in the rice field for monitoring yellow stem borer and leaf folder

Advisory.Rabi crop irrigation: 10-15 irrigations at 7-10 days interval depending on soil moisture condition

Advisory.Sugarcane crop fertilization: Apply DAP 87 kg, MOP 20 kg, FYM 4-tonne at planting. Top dress with Urea @ 60-kg per acre at specified intervals

Advisory.Tomato disease management: Spray Mancozeb 75% WP or Zineb 75% WP at interval for early and late leaf blight

Additional_Resources.OUAT_KALINGA_Products: Seedlings, Saplings, Fruits & Vegetables, Bio-Fertilizer, Bio-Pesticides, etc.
